LanguageData.CSChristmasLighting.label: Christmas lighting
LanguageData.CSChristmasLighting.description: A bundle of electrical cables with light bulbs for moving power around in christmas style. Can be placed under walls and other buildings.
LanguageData.CSLightBulb.label: light bulb
LanguageData.CSLightBulb.description: A simple light bulb used for christmas lighting.
